channel.title: Doesn't compile but I don't get errors! Please help!
channel.description:
I haven't been on this site for ages and I returned yesterday. I downloaded a server and source (both 667) and I can play it. I wanted to play with a friend of mine but after changing all the "127.0.0.1" in the files: Loader.java, client.java and gamestub.java TO my personal IP(hamachi). I tried to compile and it still connects to 127.0.0.1 (I tested the client myself, I shouldn't be able to connect to it).
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,546873.msg4009103.html#msg4009103 using this client, bue have tried some otehrs that didn't work either.
When I compile I get 2 errors, but changing the ip doesn't add new errors, so i think they can be ignored.
If anyone can help me I'd be forever gratefull. If anything, you could share a 667 client that worked and that is compilable.
Many thanks in advance

item.title: Doesn't compile but I don't get errors! Please help!
